Question: Afterwards, this person's body was buried in a small plot, (20 by 30 ft.), in Arlington National Cemetery.
Hints: For 8th grade in September 1930, the 13-year old this person attended Canterbury School in New Milford, Connecticut.
This person defended both McNamara (March, 1963) and Gilpatric (August 1963) in press conferences.
This person's civil rights proposals led to the Civil Rights Act of 1964.
